name: Copenhagen AirTaxi A/S
about: Copenhagen AirTaxi A/S is one of the oldest and largest aviation schools in Denmark, with a rich history dating back to 1961. With over 55 years of experience, we are the most experienced General Aviation company in the country. We offer a comprehensive range of flight training programs, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL). Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure that our students receive the highest quality education. We are committed to fostering a safe and supportive learning environment, preparing our graduates for successful careers in aviation. At Copenhagen AirTaxi A/S, we pride ourselves on our long-standing tradition of excellence in pilot training.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Multi-Crew Cooperation Course (MCC)
Jet Orientation Course (JOT)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating
EASA ATPL Ground School
EASA ATPL Ab Initio"]
